elements.title: Hoodoo Volcano (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Hoodoo Volcano (pictured) formed largely under glacial ice in the last 100,000 years?

elements.title: Waka Nathan (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Waka Nathan was nicknamed "the Black Panther" by a French newspaper reporter who was impressed by his ability to pursue opponents like the animal?

elements.title: Manchmal feiern wir mitten im Tag (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the 1974 song "Manchmal feiern wir mitten im Tag" claims that we sometimes celebrate resurrection in the middle of a day?

elements.title: Triple Palace (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that William Henry Vanderbilt spent US$2 million on the lavishly designed Triple Palace, but his son found the decor unfashionable?

elements.title: Ivory Winston (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that African American Ivory Winston sang for President Harry S. Truman's birthday and was "Iowa's First Lady of Song"?

elements.title: yellowtail flounders (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that yellowtail flounders are able to camouflage and mimic the seafloor?

elements.title: Guard Force (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the Rhodesian Guard Force was often implicated in criminal activity against the villagers it was meant to protect?

elements.title: Tomba! 2: The Evil Swine Return (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Whoopee Camp, the developer of Tomba! 2: The Evil Swine Return, dissolved while making their next game?
